
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


add_subdirectory(unittests)

add_library(server-lib-discovery_server)
target_compile_options(server-lib-discovery_server PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
include(FindProtobuf)
find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
include_directories(${Protobuf_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(server-lib-discovery_server PUBLIC
${Protobuf_LIBRARIES}
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-yt-core
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-ytlib-discovery_client
)
target_proto_messages(server-lib-discovery_server PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/proto/discovery_server_service.proto
)
target_sources(server-lib-discovery_server PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/config.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/cypress_integration.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/discovery_server.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/group.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/group_manager.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/group_tree.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/helpers.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/discovery_server/member.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(server-lib-discovery_server
  ./
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(server-lib-discovery_server
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/
)
